name: Lord Of The Flies
description:
This is my submission for LD48!

# The Story

You have been chosen.

The God of Defecation needs you.

Why?

Well, evil Groclocloclotrl (it's pronounced gro-oh-ca-le-ca-lo-ca-rtk-wbnxzktr-ou-ou-ua-ua-ua-uuuuu-t-arrrrrr-l) has trapped all the flies in the world deeper and deeper in the bottom of a pile of shit.

You can lead them upwards, to freedom.

How?

The flies will tell you.

# Can you escape from above?

It is a challenge, but it can be easier if you just listen to the flies...

# How To Play

## Pheromones

By clicking or dragging, you generate *pheromones*, the white particles which attract flies when they get close. As shown below:

## The Goal

The goal is simply to lead the flies upwards, eventually you will find the exit of the maze.

## Power-ups

The flies tend to stick to the walls of pooooop. In doing so they collect spiritual poo for you, which unlocks certain super powers. Choose wisely!

## Listen to the flies

The flies like to talk a lot, so listen to what they say. They give good advice sometimes...

# FInal Words

 Somehow html 5 messes up the music. It's my first game jam, I'm a musician and my music gets butchered :) please download the osx or windows binary if possible. I promise it's worth it, so you can finish the game. Let me know if you beat the game...
